forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers this morning, then cloudy with rain likely during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
